verses.name: Acts 27:9
verses.text: Now when much time was spent, and when sailing was now dangerous, because the fast was now already past, Paul admonished them,

verses.name: Acts 27:10
verses.text: And said unto them, Sirs, I perceive that this voyage will be with hurt and much damage, not only of the lading and ship, but also of our lives.

verses.name: Acts 27:11
verses.text: Nevertheless the centurion believed the master and the owner of the ship, more than those things which were spoken by Paul.
